post_title: 1946: Margret Zimmermann balancing on a tightrope over the ruins of Cologne in which was then in the British occupation zone in Germany [1600x1178]

comments.author: A-sop-D
comments.body: 1946: Margret Zimmermann balancing on a tightrope over the ruins of Cologne in which was then in the British occupation zone in Germany [1600x1178]

comments.author: Blaueveilchen
comments.body: This must be a fake picture...the tightrope is going nowhere. The tightrope is not attached to anything in one direction.

comments.author: A7Xdoneright
comments.body: 1946: Margret Zimmermann balancing on a tightrope over the ruins of Cologne in which was then in the British occupation zone in Germany [1600x1178]

comments.author: A7Xdoneright
comments.body: It is a very thin line which makes it very light so I assume it simply floats in the air. Case closed.
